definition: to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: So couldn't hedonism still be true?
sentences.chinese: 享乐主义仍然是正确的吗？

sentences.english: The consumptive idea of Gastronomy has seriously imperiled the sustainable development of society.
sentences.chinese: 享乐主义消费观对社会可持续发展构成了严重的危害。

sentences.english: But haven't yet asked, should we accept hedonism?
sentences.chinese: 但我们还没问，是否应该接受享乐主义？

sentences.english: Still, the hedonist isn't saying from a practical point of view we can necessarily do this.
sentences.chinese: 但享乐主义者并非从实用观点称，我们有必要这么做。

sentences.english: Let me just be a hedonist, trying to enjoy my life as much as possible.
sentences.chinese: 倒不如做个享乐主义者，尽情享受生活。

sentences.english: In hedonistic Las Vegas, six weeks is enough.
sentences.chinese: 在享乐主义的拉斯维加斯，六个星期就足够办完了。

sentences.english: Non-rationalism highlights id, which easily leads to the emergence of the hedonist culture.
sentences.chinese: 非理性主义突出本我，容易造成享乐主义文化的出现。

sentences.english: He was largely critical of all things Epicurean.
sentences.chinese: 他几乎对所有享乐主义的东西都加以批判。

sentences.english: And with that faith, we will walk out of the shadows of hedonism.
sentences.chinese: 我们如果拥有信念，将会走出享乐主义的阴霾。

sentences.english: That's how the hedonist says we should think about it.
sentences.chinese: 享乐主义者认为我们该那样思考问题。
这种观点被称为“享乐主义。
那是享乐主义者的观点。

sentences.english: The hedonism of sex was completely addictive, although I was totally sober (I gave up alcohol at 24).
sentences.chinese: 性爱享乐主义是上瘾的，即使我是完全的清醒。

sentences.english: The contemporary college-students tend to have the idea of hedonist consumption.
sentences.chinese: 当代大学生消费具有享乐主义倾向。

sentences.english: Well, the hedonist offers us a very simple straightforward answer.
sentences.chinese: 享乐主义提供了一个直截了当的答案。

sentences.english: Hedonism became increasingly popular among the ruling class.
sentences.chinese: 享乐主义在统治阶级中盛行。
